ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound bacon strips, cut in half
1 (8 ounce) can whole water chestnuts, drained

cookingTips: Soak wooden toothpicks in water for 30 minutes to prevent burning
Wrap bacon tightly around shrimp and water chestnut for even cooking
Brush with teriyaki sauce halfway through cooking for caramelization
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through proper wrapping technique and monitoring bacon doneness while ensuring shrimp stays tender.
